node_1.locution: JB : And that is a worthwhile ambition
node_1.proposition: that is a worthwhile ambition

node_2.locution: JB : Well, I believe there are lots of ways in which we can change our welfare state to make it better
node_2.proposition: there are lots of ways in which we can change our welfare state to make it better

node_1.locution: Claire : Because it’s a way of transforming the moral issue from a lack of jobs, a lack of a provision, to an internal failure to do that
node_1.proposition: it’s a way of transforming the moral issue from a lack of jobs, a lack of a provision, to an internal failure to do that

node_2.locution: Anne : But there is an internal failure in some cases
node_2.proposition: there is an internal failure in some cases
